rataka aarthika, samajayiya sanwardhanaya athikarannata nam adhyapanaye wiplawayak athi kala yuthu bawath, ee sandaha awashya padanama me wanawitath sakas kara athi bawath, daruwange anagathaya wadath yahapath kirima wenuwen siyalu dena ma samuhikawa katayuthu kala yuthu bawath, ee sandaha fes buk paniwuda, lipi, magin ho oonama aakarayakin idiripath karanu labana siyalu widwath yojana nihathamaniwa bharaganimata thama sudanam bawath adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahatha pawasayi.

namuth kawada ho anagathaye yam ayek mema sithiyama awabodha kara gathahoth ,ema wakawanuwa thula thakshanaya warthamanayata wada dasa dahas gunayakin diyunuwa pawathunoth ,mema sithiyame upakarayen apata ema grahaloka kihipaya soya gatha haki wana athara ehi wasaya karana jiwin samaga nawatha sambandhatha goda naga gatha haka.mita wasara dahas gananakata pera pruthuwiye siti parannan me osse pitasakwala jiwin samaga sambandhatha pawathwu athara kumak ho karunak nisa ema sabadatha bida wati atha.nuthanaye pawa pitasakwala jiwin pruthuwiya kara paminenne ,athithaye pawath wu sabadatha nisa ho ema sabadatha aluth kara ganimata wiya haka.
